CookieConsent.title: Browsing treasures
CookieConsent.description: Lootopia uses cookies to enhance your treasure hunting experience. Choose which types of cookies you wish to accept.

necessary.title: Necessary
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function.

functional.title: Functional
functional.description: These cookies enhance functionality and personalization.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with the site.

marketing.title: Marketing
marketing.description: These cookies are used to provide you with relevant advertisements.

ParticipationRequestDialog.title: Apply to participate
ParticipationRequestDialog.description:
Would you like to join this private treasure hunt?

Your request will be reviewed by the hunt creator. If it is rejected, please wait 24 hours before submitting a new request.
ParticipationRequestDialog.success: You have successfully sent a request to join the hunt!

errors.userNotFound: You are not authorized to perform this action
errors.organizerCannotBeParticipant: You cannot join your own hunt
errors.cannotRequestOnPublicHunt: You cannot send a request to join a public hunt

errors.huntIsFull: The hunt is full, you cannot send a request to join it

ParticipateDialog.description: Would you like to join this treasure hunt? You will be able to see all the details and participate in the adventure.

DeleteParticipationDialog.title: Leave the hunt
DeleteParticipationDialog.description:
Do you want to withdraw your participation from this treasure hunt? You will no longer be able to see the hunt details and will no longer participate in the adventure.

You will also lose the 50 crowns you spent to participate.
DeleteParticipationDialog.success: You have successfully withdrawn your participation from the hunt!

errors.userNotFound: You are not authorized to perform this action
